channel.title: Microsoft Developer Blogs
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, announcements, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【How can I explicitly specialize a templated C++ constructor?】如何显式特化模板化 C++ 构造函数？
item.description: 【Looking for a C++ tag type for representing another type.】寻找 C++ 标记类型来表示另一种类型。

item.title: 【Announcement: Agent Framework Documentation Updates】公告：Agent 框架文档更新
item.description: 【The Semantic Kernel Agent Framework revolutionizes how developers can interact with Large Language Models (LLMs) by embedding dynamic, multi-step agents into their applications. By combining the power of LLMs with structured programming, the framework allows developers to build intelligent systems that can autonomously carry out tasks, reason based on context, and collaborate across multiple agents. […]】语义内核代理框架通过将动态、多步骤代理嵌入到应用程序中，彻底改变了开发人员与大型语言模型 (LLM) 交互的方式。通过将法学硕士的强大功能与结构化编程相结合，该框架允许开发人员构建可以自主执行任务、基于上下文进行推理以及跨多个代理协作的智能系统。 […]

item.title: 【New Contextual Tools for GitHub Copilot in Visual Studio】Visual Studio 中 GitHub Copilot 的新上下文工具
item.description: 【Visual Studio 2022 17.11 now allows you to pass your entire workspace or specific classes and functions as context for GitHub Copilot Chat. By referencing your entire codebase, down to specific classes and functions, Copilot Chat can deliver refined and accurate results tailored to your code. @workspace for project references You can now use GitHub […]】Visual Studio 2022 17.11 现在允许您将整个工作区或特定类和函数作为 GitHub Copilot Chat 的上下文传递。通过引用您的整个代码库，具体到特定的类和函数，Copilot Chat 可以提供针对您的代码量身定制的精致且准确的结果。 @workspace 用于项目参考您现在可以使用 GitHub [...]

item.title: 【Multimodal RAG with Vision: From Experimentation to Implementation】具有愿景的多模态 RAG：从实验到实施
item.description: 【This blog post delves into the experimentation journey of fine-tuning a multimodal RAG pipeline to best answer user queries that require both textual and image context. We ran our experiments by systematically testing various approaches, adjusting one configuration setting at a time and using clearly defined evaluation metrics to validate the performance of each component of the RAG pipeline in isolation, as well as the end-to-end inference flow.】这篇博文深入探讨了微调多模式 RAG 管道的实验过程，以最好地回答需要文本和图像上下文的用户查询。我们通过系统地测试各种方法、一次调整一种配置设置并使用明确定义的评估指标来独立验证 RAG 管道每个组件的性能以及端到端推理流来进行实验。

item.title: 【Engineering the Scalable Vector Extension in .NET】在 .NET 中设计可扩展矢量扩展
item.description: 【Let's take an in-depth look at how the team implemented the Scalable Vector Extension (SVE) for .NET.】让我们深入了解一下团队如何为 .NET 实现可扩展矢量扩展 (SVE)。

item.title: 【On naming things: The tension between naming something for what it is, what it does, or how it is used】关于命名事物：根据事物的本质、用途或使用方式来命名事物之间的紧张关系
item.description: 【You are guaranteed to make someone upset.】你肯定会让某人心烦意乱。

item.title: 【Java on Visual Studio Code Update – September 2024】Visual Studio 代码上的 Java 更新 – 2024 年 9 月
item.description: 【Hi everyone, welcome to the September update for Visual Studio Code for Java! In this blog, we will cover some important Spring feature updates and Gradle enhancements, let’s get started! Spring Updates Explain SpEL expressions, query statements, and AOP pointcut expressions with GitHub Copilot SpEL expressions, query statements, and AOP pointcut expressions can sometimes be […]】大家好，欢迎来到 Visual Studio Code for Java 九月更新！在这篇博客中，我们将介绍一些重要的 Spring 功能更新和 Gradle 增强功能，让我们开始吧！ Spring 更新使用 GitHub Copilot 解释 SpEL 表达式、查询语句和 AOP 切入点表达式 SpEL 表达式、查询语句和 AOP 切入点表达式有时可以是 [...]

item.title: 【Azure Developer CLI (azd) – October 2024】Azure 开发人员 CLI (azd) – 2024 年 10 月
item.description: 【This post announces the October release of the Azure Developer CLI (`azd`), including configurable api-version for ACA.】这篇文章宣布了 10 月份发布的 Azure 开发人员 CLI (`azd`)，包括 ACA 的可配置 api 版本。

item.title: 【Catch the highlights from Azure Developers – .NET Aspire Day 2024!】了解 Azure 开发人员的亮点 - 2024 年 .NET Aspire Day！
item.description: 【Watch the top sessions on demand for insights and practical guidance on building distributed applications with .NET Aspire!】按需观看顶级会议，了解有关使用 .NET Aspire 构建分布式应用程序的见解和实用指导！

item.title: 【The ultimate chatbot?】终极聊天机器人？
item.description: 【RAG – Retrieval Augmented Generation – is by far one of the most common patterns today as it enables the creation of chatbots that can chat on your own data, as I described in my previous “Retrieval Augmented Generation with Azure SQL” blog post. As soon as you start to use it excitement grows, as […]】RAG（检索增强生成）是迄今为止最常见的模式之一，因为它可以创建可以在您自己的数据上聊天的聊天机器人，正如我在之前的“使用 Azure SQL 进行检索增强生成”博客文章中所述。一旦您开始使用它，兴奋就会增加，因为 [...]
